sentences.en: A : They leveled off the road so efficiently after the landslide.
sentences.cn: 山崩后他们很有效率地把路面整平了.

sentences.en: A seven-year-old boy was found dead after a landslide engulfed a block of flats.
sentences.cn: 山体滑坡掩埋了一栋公寓楼，造成一名7岁男孩丧生。

sentences.en: He won last month's presidential election by a landslide.
sentences.cn: 他以压倒性多数赢得上月的总统选举。

sentences.en: Interesting hummocks swirls and are found on the surface of the landslide.
sentences.cn: 在山体滑坡的表面,我们能够看到有趣的山包,盘绕的丘陵和悬崖.

sentences.en: Listen for rumbling sounds that might indicate an approaching landslide or mudflow.
sentences.cn: 听见隆隆的声音可能预示着新一次即将来临的滑坡或泥石流.

sentences.en: Many people were dug out after being burried by the landslide.
sentences.cn: 有许多埋在土里的人被挖出来.

sentences.en: Our candidate is predicated to win by a landslide.
sentences.cn: 我们的候选人被预言讲义绝对优势取胜.

sentences.en: Rapid melting of the snow caused masses of the landslide to break off.
sentences.cn: 积雪的急剧融化使滑坡解体.

sentences.en: Rapid melting of the snow saturated debris in a large landslide.
sentences.cn: 积雪的急剧融化使大滑坡中的岩屑饱和.

sentences.en: The heavy rain was responsible for the landslide.
The landslide earthed up the pool where the animals usually drank water.
sentences.cn: 滑坡把动物常饮水的水池填平了.

sentences.en: The landslide earthed up the pool where the animals usually drank.
sentences.cn: 滑坡填塞了动物通常来饮水的这个水坑.

sentences.en: The railroad was blocked by a landslide.
The storm caused landslides and flooding in Savona.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨引发了萨沃纳的山崩和水灾。

sentences.en: The village was destroyed by a landslide.
Their house was buried by a landslide.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子在一次塌方中被掩埋。

trans.tran_en: a sudden fall of a lot of earth or rocks down a hill, cliff etc
